import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(public authService: AuthService) { } logout() { this.authService.logout(); } }
